select(String, String) - Method in class edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSClientCommands
Returns all GUIDs that have a field that contains the given value as a JSONArray containing guids.
select(String, String) - Static method in class edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSCommand
Searches for all GUIDs whose field has the value value.
selectLookupGroupQuery(String) - Method in class edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSClientCommands
Look up the value of a context aware group guid using a query.
selectLookupGroupQuery(String) - Static method in class edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSCommand
Looks up the membership of a context-aware group GUID created using a query.
selectNear(String, JSONArray, Double) - Method in class edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSClientCommands
If field is a GeoSpatial field queries the GNS server and returns all the guids that have fields that are near value which is a point specified as a two element JSONArray: [LONG, LAT].
selectNear(String, JSONArray, Double) - Static method in class edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSCommand
If field is a GeoSpatial field, the query searches for all GUIDs whose field is near value that is a point specified as a two element JSONArray: [LONG, LAT].
selectQuery(String) - Method in class edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSClientCommands
Selects all records that match query.
selectQuery(String) - Static method in class edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSCommand
Selects all GUID records that match query.
selectSetupGroupQuery(GuidEntry, String, String, int) - Method in class edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSClientCommands
Set up a context aware group guid using a query.
selectSetupGroupQuery(GuidEntry, String, String, int) - Static method in class edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSCommand
Set up a context-aware group GUID corresponding to the query.
selectWithin(String, JSONArray) - Method in class edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSClientCommands
If field is a GeoSpatial field queries the GNS server return all the guids that have fields that are within value which is a bounding box specified as a nested JSONArrays of paired tuples: [[LONG_UL, LAT_UL],[LONG_BR, LAT_BR]]
selectWithin(String, JSONArray) - Static method in class edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSCommand
If field is a GeoSpatial field, the query searches for all GUIDs that have fields that are within the bounding box specified by value as nested JSONArrays of paired tuples: [[LONG_UL, LAT_UL],[LONG_BR, LAT_BR]].
setForceCoordinatedReads(boolean) - Method in class edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSClient
Sets the value of forcing read operations to be coordinated.
setGNSProxy(InetSocketAddress) - Method in class edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSClient
 
setLocation(String, double, double, GuidEntry) - Method in class edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSClientCommands
